subject: The Federal Reserve Bank wri
body:
The Federal Reserve Bank write to notify you that after  series of meetings with the United Nations and World-Bank including the World Health Organization high cost food and inflation we the Federal Reserve Bank have been appointed to pay you and your family member Covid-19  Palliative Funds of  $1,000,000 to support and you and your family as we prayer for the world for peace.
Before we will proceed with this payment kindly forward your full details as below.
Full Name:
House Address:
Your Direct Phone Number:
Your Occupation:
Any kind of ID: International Passport Or ID Card:
Miss Lydia Brown
Remittance Department
E-mail Reply: 
federalRbank09@usa.com

subject: Re:   The Federal Reserve Bank wri
body:
Hello Miss Lydia Brown,

Thank you so much for reaching out to me. I'm really grateful for this support during these challenging times. It's heartwarming to know that organizations like the Federal Reserve Bank and the United Nations are working together to help people.

Could you please tell me more about how this Covid Palliative Funds program works? How was it decided who would receive these funds? And what is the process for receiving them?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Dale
